mapper.select: SELECT m.matching_id, u.user_name AS pr_name, u.user_dept AS pr_dept, ku.user_name AS st_name, ku.user_dept AS st_dept, m.matching_type, m.matching_date FROM k_matching AS m JOIN k_users AS u ON u.user_id = m.prof_id JOIN k_users AS ku ON ku.user_id = m.stu_id

SELECT s.stu_id, u.user_name, s.student_aca_yn, u.user_dept, s.student_grade, u.user_phone, s.student_prof FROM k_users AS u JOIN k_students AS s ON u.user_id = s.stu_id WHERE user_type = 'ROLE_STU' AND s.student_prof IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT p.prof_id, u.user_name, u.user_dept, p.prof_lab, p.prof_mentee - count(s.stu_id) AS mentee FROM k_professors p JOIN k_users u ON p.prof_id = u.user_id JOIN k_students s ON p.prof_id = s.student_prof GROUP BY prof_id HAVING mentee < 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k_matching ( prof_id, matching_date, matching_type, matching_id, stu_id ) VALUES (#{userId}, NOW(), '매칭중', nextval(matchigId_seq), #{studentId})
mapper.update: UPDATE k_students SET student_prof = #{userId} WHERE stu_id = #{studentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k_matching_change ( stu_id, matching_change_yn, matching_change_date, prof_id, matching_change_reason, matching_want ) VALUES ( #{stuId}, '검토중', NOW(), #{profId}, #{matchingChangeReason}, #{matchingWant} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.stu_id, u.user_name, u.user_dept, s.student_grade, s.student_aca_yn, ku.user_name AS prof, c.matching_change_reason, ku2.user_name AS wantprof FROM k_matching_change c JOIN k_users u ON c.stu_id = u.user_id JOIN k_students s ON c.stu_id = s.stu_id JOIN k_users ku ON ku.user_id = c.matching_want JOIN k_users ku2 ON ku2.user_id = s.student_prof
